increases (mean) but makes big swings possible (may increase variance)
mechanism:
- Competitiveness increases variance in the proportionality of seats
- Increasing certainty of proportional outcome means decreasing the competitiveness of districts

edge: ensuring proportionally means few swing districts
mechanism: proportionality is inverse to measures like wasted votes and the efficiency gap
A partisan gerrymander aims to diverge from proportionality

edge: decreases overall (but heterogeneous and conditional on correlation between party and community)
mechanism: A partisan gerrymander aims to maximize "minimally safe" districts
